Interbase Data Access Components
Copyright 1997-2011, Devart. All Rights Reserved
--------------------------------------------------

There are two demos for ReportBuilder Pro included in IBDAC:

  1. Demos\ReportBuilder\RB5 - this demo was built and tested using
     Report Builder Pro 7.04 for Delphi 5

  2. Demos\ReportBuilder\RB10 - this demo was built and tested using
     Report Builder Pro 10.04 for Delphi 7

IMPORTANT NOTE:
  Demos are provided "as is", and there is no warranty that they are fully
  compatible with other versions of Report Builder Pro.
